modName: Asgrims Hold and DrHkls Forgotten Realms Weaponry
summary: A small but difficult dungeon filled with treasure and 6 new (mesh and texture) weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Clear your inventory or at least a weapon plaque or two; you are gonna want these.  Some may remember my mod for Oblivion...well let\'s just say I learned a few things since then.  The mod includes a tough dungeon located across the river from Riverwood.  Inside you will find 6 new weapons. Twinkle, IcingDeath, Charon\'s Claw, Artemis Entreri\'s Dagger, Tunder-Klap and Soulreaver.
They all have tempering formulas and a recipe (for purists who may think the enchantments are too powerful).  The readme includes their stats.

Ver 1.2  

Fixed Soulreaver blood plane
Created 1H Soulreaver variant
Moved the entrance to Asgrim\'s Hold farther downstream (N)
author: DrHkl

files.name: Ver 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Soulreaver Blood plane to fit the blade better
Made a 1H version of Soulreaver
Moved Asgrim\'s Hold Entrance
